For those having trouble:
*Extract files from .zip to their own new folder in your saved downloads (i.e. Roller Coaster Tycoon 3 Platinum)
*Run Setup.exe from the unzipped folder and let it finish
*Copy "RCT3Plus" from the Crack folder in your unzipped folder and paste it into Program Files\Atari\RollerCoaster Tycoon Platinum 3 (or wherever you let the Setup put all of the game's program files)
*Yes to overwrite the old RCT3Plus in the Program Files
*Enjoy!
